TEXT.TITLE: ILLINOIS TOOL WORKS <ITW> SELLS TWO DIVISIONS
TEXT.BODY: Illinois Tool Works Inc said it completed the sale of its Drill and End Mill division, Pine Bluff, Arkansas and Eclipse Counterbore division, Detroit, to newly-formed Eclipse Industrial Pruducts Inc, based in St. Louis. Terms were not disclosed. All employees at both locations will be retained, it added. Reuter
